description:
I went through and fixed up a lot of stuff. It's not a perfect tab, but it's a lot better than the previous one.

This is what I did:

* Got rid of all of the lazily placed repeats

* Fixed many of the guitar and bass riffs (they're still not perfect, though.)

* Almost completely fixed the drums

* Added names

That's all I did. And sorry if the volumes in the tab end up unbalanced, I have absolutely no control over them. :{
title: Buried By The Dead
